column4: i used DeVeDe to make an iso from an mp4 source. when i went to burn the iso it asked me if i wanted to burn the iso or its contents i chose burn the iso which put the iso on my dvd as a data file but now i dont get the option to burn the contents... anyone know how to burn the iso so that it works in a stand alone dvd player?
what program do you guys use to burn .iso files to dvd?
